Articles.Content:
I turn the sand into sandstone (Geologic processes) and carve it into a statue of me.

My statue.

I sent Bart Simpson to saw off the head of the statue.

My sandstone head.

I use lava (screw physics) and melt the head. 

My glass puddle

I smash it 

I go claim a hill on moho My hot hill.

I Hyperedit Moho out to somewhere near Eeloo's orbit.

My cold planet.

I hyperedit Moho to be inside The Sun.

My Solar Empire.

I find yet another hill on Earth.

My other hill on Earth.

I blow up the Earth. End of story.

I collect all of the mass in the Oort Cloud into a planet, and find a hill on it.

My Oort Planet hill.

I watch television.

My hill.

![Hank.png](http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120107020136/kingofthehill/images/0/0e/Hank.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-08-10T18:44:34Z" title="08/10/2014 06:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">August 10, 2014</time> by Souper**

I blow up the show that inspired this thread and instead make the thread myself.

My KotH thread.

A moderator shuts it down, and i revive it.

My revived hill.

I took down Super.

My hill.

I drop a pile of trash over designer225

My pile of trash.

I cover you and your pile of trash with dirt and rock, making a hill.

My trash filled hill.

A garbage collector comes and picks it up. I then kill Jack and Jill.

My hill.

I push you off a cliff.

My hill.

I run you over the cliff using my "duck" (Amphibious vehicle) and somehow that duck floated...

No one's hill.

I use a portal gun that I happened to be holding when I fell off the cliff to portal back to the hill.

Still my hill.

I am Sheldon Cooper. You're in my spot.

My spot.

I cancel your show due to not being funny and you go bankrupt

My spot

I stand right next to you, and make friends.

Our spot.

I use fungi to mind control you 2.

My 2 friend-slaves.

Me and super start a slave rebellion

Our spot.

Russia comes in and kills everybody.

Russia's territory.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-08-12T15:22:49Z" title="08/12/2014 03:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">August 12, 2014</time> by Souper**

I rename "Russia" to "My".

My hill.
